name: Hotel AlaGare

reviews.title: Mixed Bag
reviews.text: We stayed here on our driving tour through Europe and although it was not the worst, it was close. We used tripadvisor before booking and based on the existing comments thought it would be good. We have travelled quite extensively and do not consider ourselves to be overly fussy - however this hotel did leave something to be desired.

reviews.title: A fantastic hotel
reviews.text: Whilst the reception staff were indeed very helpful and the room was visually appealling to start with, it did back onto the train station and these could be heard through the night, at least from our room. The fact that we had some rowdy neighbours probably didn't help. Also in the morning the room smelt like the toilet had been leaking. Needless to say we vacated as soon as possible.

reviews.title: Great Base for Exploration
reviews.text: For breakfast we had to go down 1 lift and up another as there are 2 buildings. If you are non-smoker, be warned that smoking is permitted at breakfast which can make breakfast unpleasant. Also the breakfast staff seemed to ignore everyone while they ate their own breakfast and smoked.

description: Our hotel is centrally located in a quiet pedestrian street (authorized access by car/bus to the entrance door for check-in/out) between Lake Geneva and the old town, 150 m from the railway station and bus stops. The famous Olympic Museum is at 12 minutes walking distance and the Beaulieu Congress and Exhibit Centre is only 1,5 km away (an 8-minute bus ride). Free highspeed WiFi internet access in each room and PC/Webcorner in the reception (open 24 hours) lobby.
